actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, as amended, to exclude illegal aliens from coverage under the Act.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exclude from coverage under such Act aliens who have not been: (1) lawfully admitted for permanent residence; or (2) authorized by the Attorney General to accept employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, as amended, to exclude illegal aliens from coverage under the Act.
